data.title: Interstellar : Humanity's Last Hope.
data.desc: Interstellar is an epic sci-fi film where a team of astronauts travels through a wormhole in search of a new home for humanity, blending emotional depth with scientific adventure.

data.title: Martian : Survival on Mars
data.desc: Martian is a gripping sci-fi novel by Andy Weir, detailing astronaut Mark Watney's survival after being stranded on Mars, blending humor and science in a tale of ingenuity and resilience.

data.title: Gravity : A drift in Space
data.desc: Gravity is a thrilling sci-fi film where two astronauts struggle for survival after a devastating accident leaves them adrift in space, highlighting human perseverance against the void.

data.title: Star Wars - A Galactic Battle: Destiny
data.desc: Star Wars is an iconic sci-fi saga that follows the epic battle between the Rebel Alliance and the Galactic Empire, featuring timeless characters and adventures in a galaxy far, far away.

data.title: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial
data.desc: E.T. is a heartwarming sci-fi film about a young boy who befriends a stranded alien and helps him find his way home, capturing the magic of friendship and adventure.
